header.description: Property.  Navigation Satellite fix for any Global Navigation Satellite System   Specified using the WGS 84 reference ellipsoid  header.stamp specifies the ROS time for this measurement (the  corresponding satellite time may be reported using the  sensor_msgs/TimeReference message).   header.frame_id is the frame of reference reported by the satellite  receiver, usually the location of the antenna. This is a  Euclidean frame relative to the vehicle, not a reference  ellipsoid.

latitude.description: Property.  Latitude [degrees]. Positive is north of equator; negative is south.

longitude.description: Property.  Longitude [degrees]. Positive is east of prime meridian; negative is west.

altitude.description: Property.  Altitude [m]. Positive is above the WGS 84 ellipsoid  (quiet NaN if no altitude is available).

position_covariance_type.description: Property.  If the covariance of the fix is known, fill it in completely. If the  GPS receiver provides the variance of each measurement, put them  along the diagonal. If only Dilution of Precision is available,  estimate an approximate covariance from that.
